channel.title: Thieving help please

item.title: Thieving help please
item.dc:creator: @NineDivine NineDivine
item.description:
@NineDivine wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]The clickOnObject doesn’t sound like the problem.

If you dc when you level, I’d say it’s your LevelUp method (method name not right.)
I’m not sure of the ‘LevelUp’ method name, but it’s the one that sends the ‘Congratulations you’ve advanced a STATNAME level.’

I believe it has an error while loading the thieving skill.
If not, then it would most likely be the ClickOnObject void.[/quote]

Any idea about the massive amounts of xp and cash?

Read full topic

item.title: Thieving help please
item.dc:creator: @NineDivine NineDivine
item.description:
@NineDivine wrote:

Okay so i got some stalls and i get more xp and cash then in wanted and everytime you level you dc :S heres my code:

if(objectID == 4878){
TheifStall(“stall”, “and recieve a scimitar”, 77, 90playerLevel[17], Item.randomScimitar(), 1, 0x340);
}
if(objectID == 2561){
TheifStall(“cake stall”, “and recieve 150k!”, 60, 75playerLevel[17], 995, 150000, 0x340);
}
if(objectID == 2562){
TheifStall(“gem stall”, “and recieve 250k!”, 80, 15000playerLevel[17], 995, 250000playerLevel[17], 0x340);
setAnimation(881);
}
if(objectID == 4876){
TheifStall(“General Stall”, “And Recieve Some Coins!”, 20, 102playerLevel[17], 995, 50000playerLevel[17], 0x340);
setAnimation(881);
}
if(objectID == 2560){
TheifStall(“silk stall”, “And recive 50k!”, 1, 750playerLevel[17], 995, 50000playerLevel[17], 0x340);
}
if(objectID == 2565){
TheifStall(“silver stall”, “and recieve 100k!”, 25, 37playerLevel[17], 995, 100000playerLevel[17], 0x340);
}
if(objectID == 4708){
TheifStall(“vegetable stall”, “and recieve a tomatoe”, 60, 35*playerLevel[17], 1982, 1, 0x340);
}

Read full topic
